bestPractices: Always set alt text; use empty alt for decorative images.
Constrain sizes and choose object‑fit (`cover`/`contain`) deliberately to avoid layout shift.
Use responsive sources or sizes where appropriate; avoid full‑resolution assets in small spaces.
Lazy‑load below‑the‑fold images; preload critical hero imagery.
Avoid background images for content; prefer `<Image>` so a11y tools can interpret it.
Apply rounded corners via a wrapper (Panel/Box) with `overflow: hidden`; do not rely on per‑component props.
